comments.body:
Nice cleanup.
For easy reviewing, the code of the function is https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/d5ea0edc0967697c1adf6e70831e5cb1a38d26a2/test/e2e/framework/pods.go#L99-L108

diffHunk:
